Kotlin for Android Developers

Learn Kotlin the easy way while developing an Android App. This book is dedicated to all the loyal readers of antonioleiva.com, who made me believe that writing about Android development was a powerful tool to help others learn about it.

Key Concepts:

  • Kotlin for Android Developers
  • Learn Kotlin
  • Android App Development
  • Operator tables
  • Extension functions
  • Visibility Modifiers
  • Basics of Generics
  • Variance in Generics
  • Generic Examples
  • Settings Screen
